<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.nowAssistPanelUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Checks to see if all criteria is met in order to activate the NAP</description>
        <name>nowAssistPanelUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var nowAssistPanelUtil = Class.create();
nowAssistPanelUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	isEnabled: function() {
		//Check if admin settings are enabled for NowAssist and NowAssist Panel
		if(!new sn_nowassist_admin.NowAssistConfig().isNowAssistEnabled() || !new sn_nowassist_admin.NowAssistConfig().isNowAssistPanelEnabled()) {
			gs.debug("NowAssist is disabled in Admin Settings, NAP will not be active");
			return false;
		}

		//Ensure User has nowAssist role
		if(!gs.hasRole("now_assist_panel_user")) {
			gs.debug("User does not have NAP role, NAP will not be active");
			return false;
		}

		return true;
	},
    type: 'nowAssistPanelUtil'
};]]></script>
